movie.title: Death Shadow
movie.description_intro: After their executions are faked by the authorities, three criminals are forced to become assassins under the Shogun's command
movie.description_full: After their executions are faked by the authorities, three criminals are forced to become assassins under the Shogun's command

movies.title: Toxin
movies.summary: A pharmaceutical company recruits a well-known scientist to help develop a vaccine against a deadly virus.
movies.description_full: A pharmaceutical company recruits a well-known scientist to help develop a vaccine against a deadly virus.
movies.synopsis: A pharmaceutical company recruits a well-known scientist to help develop a vaccine against a deadly virus.

movies.title: Christmas Cupid
movies.summary: Sloane is a beautiful, stylish woman on the fast track to success in her public relations firm when a starlet client, Caitlin, dies. Caitlin immediately becomes Sloane's own personal "Jacob Marley" (the Christmas Carol ghost) ushering in the spirits of Christmas past, present, and future - all in the guises of Sloane's former boyfriends. Sloane finds out first hand that her unethical ways and workaholic habits need to change and that reuniting with one of the past lovers whom she jilted may be the answer for a happy-ever-after life.

movies.title: Regular Show: The Movie
movies.summary: After a future, dying Rigby comes to warn the gang about the future, they must time travel back in time to when Mordecai and Rigby were in high school to stop a evil, crazy volleyball coach from destroying time. Will it work? Can Rigby tell the truth even if it will cost him and Mordecai their friendship?

movies.title: Return of the Sister Street Fighter
movies.title_english: Return of the Sister Street Fighter
movies.title_long: Return of the Sister Street Fighter (1975)
movies.summary: When the crime boss has to pick one of his thugs for a fight he takes his knife, throws it to the roof and kills a butterfly with it, then the knife falls to one guy's shoulder and that's the man he's chosen for the job. That's some serious inventiveness. And who's the guys he's gonna fight? That's Yasuaki Kurata of course.
movies.description_full: When the crime boss has to pick one of his thugs for a fight he takes his knife, throws it to the roof and kills a butterfly with it, then the knife falls to one guy's shoulder and that's the man he's chosen for the job. That's some serious inventiveness. And who's the guys he's gonna fight? That's Yasuaki Kurata of course.
